newsitem.title: UK: BAe soars as Kleinwort says 20pct undervalued.
newsitem.headline: BAe soars as Kleinwort says 20pct undervalued.

text.p: Shares in British Aerospace Plc jumped to a record high for a second day on Wednesday as analysts at Dresdner Kleinwort Benson repeated a "buy" rating and said the stock was 20 percent undervalued, traders said.

The stock was up 28p at 13.50 stg by 0946 GMT, after earlier reaching a record 1355 stg. However, trading volume in the stock was a modest 640,509 shares and dealers said a shortage of stock in the market had exaggerated today's gains.
Analysts at Kleinwort were not immediately available for comment.
BAe shares rose on Tuesday after reports of possible major overseas orders, with Airbus Industrie bidding for a Chinese order worth around $5 billion.
Dealers said the stock also continued to benefit from last week's results showing pre-tax profits up over 80 percent at 425 million stg.
